templateOptions.label: Corraltion attribute for resolving the caller in Topdesk
Caller
templateOptions.description: Fixed value or a variable corresponding to the correlation attribute

templateOptions.label: RequestShort
templateOptions.description: Fill in the desired title of the change.

templateOptions.label: RequestDescription1
templateOptions.description: You can add your own html tags to the incident. Please read the readme for more information

templateOptions.label: RequestDescription2
templateOptions.description: You can add your own html tags to the incident. Please read the readme for more information

templateOptions.label: Action
templateOptions.description: Fill in the action field if needed. If not used fill in null. You can add your own html tags to the incident. Please read the readme for more information

templateOptions.label: Branch
templateOptions.description: Fill in the branch name that is used in Topdesk. This is a mandatory lookup field.

templateOptions.label: OperatorGroup
templateOptions.description: Fill in the operator group name that is used in Topdesk. It is possible to disable this lookup field by leaving it empty. If marked mandatory in Topdesk this will be shown when opening the incident.

templateOptions.label: Corraltion attribute for resolving the operator in Topdesk
Operator
templateOptions.description: Fill in the operator value corresponding to the correlation attribute. It is possible to disable this lookup field by leaving it empty. If marked mandatory in Topdesk this will be shown when opening the incident.

templateOptions.label: Category
templateOptions.description: Fill in the category name that is used in Topdesk. It is possible to disable this lookup field by leaving it empty. If marked mandatory in Topdesk this will be shown when opening the incident.

templateOptions.label: SubCategory
templateOptions.description: Fill in the subcategory name that is used in Topdesk. It is possible to disable this lookup field by leaving it empty. If marked mandatory in Topdesk this will be shown when opening the incident.

templateOptions.label: CallType
templateOptions.description: Fill in the branch call type that is used in Topdesk. It is possible to disable this lookup field by leaving it empty. If marked mandatory in Topdesk this will be shown when opening the incident.

templateOptions.label: Impact
templateOptions.description: Fill in the impact name that is used in Topdesk. It is possible to disable this lookup field by leaving it empty. If marked mandatory in Topdesk this will be shown when opening the incident.

templateOptions.label: Priority
templateOptions.description: Fill in the priority name that is used in Topdesk. It is possible to disable this lookup field by leaving it empty. If marked mandatory in Topdesk this will be shown when opening the incident.

templateOptions.label: EntryType
templateOptions.description: Fill in the entry type name that is used in Topdesk. It is possible to disable this lookup field by leaving it empty. If marked mandatory in Topdesk this will be shown when opening the incident.

templateOptions.label: Urgency
templateOptions.description: Fill in the urgency name that is used in Topdesk. It is possible to disable this lookup field by leaving it empty. If marked mandatory in Topdesk this will be shown when opening the incident.

templateOptions.label: ProcessingStatus
templateOptions.description: Fill in the processing status name that is used in Topdesk. It is possible to disable this lookup field by leaving it empty. If marked mandatory in Topdesk this will be shown when opening the incident. With the correct processing status, it is possible to create a closed incident.
